thread.title: For the future of Budva: Mikijelj's homely approach achieved significant results
thread.title_full: For the future of Budva: Mikijelj's homely approach achieved significant results

author: @Vijestime
title: For the future of Budva: Mikijelj's homely approach achieved significant results
text: With a homely approach and through the dedication of the list holder Mladen Mikijelj and his team, Budva has experienced significant development in infrastructure, economy and environmental sustainability, laying the foundations for a bright future, according to the statement of the list "For the future of Budva - Budva, an open city". "Mladen Mikijelj, holder of the list 'For the future of Budva - Budva, an open city' and a candidate for the president of the municipality, together with his team, showed how clear results can change the future of Montenegro and Budva. Through their dedication, Budva has experienced significant development in infrastructure, economy and environmental sustainability, laying the foundations for a bright future," the announcement of this list states. It is further emphasized that Mikijelj achieved significant results with a homely approach, among which, as they claim from his list, is that he "returned the Kamenari - Lepetane ferry line to Montenegro and increased the income from it from 200 to eight million euros, raised the budget JP Morsko dobro from 4,5 to 24 million euros, built promenades on the Jaz, in Pr≈æno, and a promenade and square in Sutomor, built the 'Velika Skela' pier in Ulcinj, and the construction of the 'Pet Danica' promenade in Herceg Novi is underway.
